data.eml:eml: The digger wasps of the genus Prionyx Vander Linden (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) of Russia and Central Asia, with a key to species, new synonymies, and lectotype designations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Danilov, Yuriy N. (2012): The digger wasps of the genus Prionyx Vander Linden (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) of Russia and Central Asia, with a key to species, new synonymies, and lectotype designations. Zootaxa 3526: 59-71, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282745
